lines.text:
[after witnessing the miracle]
Only the fool saith "There is no God".
Let's just say that God doesn't believe in me.
Why do you hold back, child? What else did the Blessed Mother say?
I never said she was the Blessed Mother!
But we did see a lovely lady in a cloud! Who else could it be?
Pray or I'll beat your brains out!
You have been using the same rosary for 30 years? You have worn off all the blessings.
